text:
Sir Elton John to address MPs after HIV testing trials success

The rock legend steps up his campaign to eradicate HIV, as a new NHS testing scheme shows promising results.

Sean 'Diddy' Combs steps aside at Revolt TV network

The news comes after the hip hop mogul faced three sexual assault lawsuits in recent weeks.

Spotify Wrapped 2023: 'Music genres are now irrelevant to fans'

With over 6,000 classifications on Spotify, fewer fans choose their music by genre in the digital age.

Charles Melton, Lily Gladstone and ‘Past Lives’ Get Oscar Boosts at Gotham Awards

The Gotham Awards brought the usual array of surprises this year, and it wasn’t only about who walked away with the trophies. Aside from the uproar over Robert De Niro’s speech (which is unlikely to have much bearing on the awards campaign for “Killers of the Flower Moon”), some of the other top contenders gained […]

Why Broadway’s ‘Spamalot’ Cast Can’t Keep a Straight Face

While the cast of the new Broadway production of “Spamalot” is cracking up audiences, they’re all trying their best not to crack up as well. Listen to this week’s “Stagecraft” podcast below: On the new episode of “Stagecraft,” Variety’s theater podcast, actors James Monroe Iglehart, Leslie Rodriguez Kritzer and Michael Urie gave listeners a glimpse of the […]
title: Dj Khaled Crashes Jamie Foxx's 2017 American Music Awards Interview

meta_data.description: Major key alert! Viewers got a double dose of star power Sunday night during E!'s red carpet coverage of the 2017 American Music Awards when DJ Khaled made an unexpected...
